item.title: C++ Notes
item.description: C++ Introduction to C++11 and C++14 with Example Code Snippet 4 Lamba Expressions of Lambda Functions 1 [firstPart](secondPart) TypeYouReturn{ BodyOfLambda}(acctualParameters); lambda function: 1 double dUpperPart=[]{double dX, double dY}double{return dX*dX+dY*dY;} 1 2 3 4 vector<int> iVector; for_each(begin(iVector),end(iVector),[](int n){ if(n%2==0) cout << n << endl; }); 5 Static Assertion 1 static_assert(evaluateExpression, stringMessage); 1 static_assert(sizeof(long long int)>=16;"This is unexpected"); 7 move and && 1 2 MovableClass(MovableClass&&); MOvableClass&& operator=(MovableClass&&); 8 Few Notes about Pointers unique_ptr: If something has ownership it could not be shared, but it is movable.
